cards.name: Vantage Bridge
cards.originalText:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
Whenever a creature with power less than the converted mana cost of the top card of your library attacks you or a planeswalker you control, draw a card.

rulings.text: Vantage Bridge may trigger multiple times at once. Each of these triggers checks the converted mana cost of the top card of your library *only* when it triggers. You will reveal each card drawn with Vantage Bridge but the draw is not conditional on those card's converted mana cost.
If you have multiple libraries, Vantage Bridge will trigger once if a creature with the power less than the converted mana cost of any of your libraries attack you or a planeswalker you control.
